title: backdoor files
extract: A malicious backdoor is code that allows unauthorized and often unrestricted access to a compromised site. ... Or, a backdoor can be a standalone file. Backdoor access allows an attacker to place any malicious code on the site. Backdoors are often found in conjunction with other malware.Mar 8, 2018
